ISSUE.TITLE: Typo in locale about uninstalled plugins
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: develop > The following English string does appear correct in syntax: > > ``` > You may delete the plugins you don't use in order to increase startup time > ``` > > I believe the phrase only makes sense when using `decrease` in this string.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #6101 Fixed typo in locale about uninstalled plugins
